snippet: The Christian Social Union’s suggestion that immigrants speak German, even at home, quickly incited ridicule and fury before the party retreated.
abstract: Party leaders of Christian Social Union, one of Germany's governing parties, back away from idea of urging immigrants to speak German after proposal by party was greeted with ridicule.
lead_paragraph: The Christian Social Union’s suggestion that immigrants speak German, even at home, quickly incited ridicule and fury before the party retreated.

headline.main: Party Backs Off German-Only as a Suggestion for Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Party Backs Off German-Only as a Suggestion for Immigrants
